name: FNIA: ERROR 404
description:
A brand new VN bringing back the old days of Five Nights in Anime. Remember when that was a thing? Damn that was a long ass time ago. You play as the nightguard. Also known as (Whatever the fuck you set your name to) because the animatronics refuse to call you anything else. The animatronics are out to get some of that vitamin D if ya know what I'm sayin' ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Credits:

Sprites: Mairusu 

 Music: Myself, Mairusu, and Scott Cawthon

Original Games: FNAF from Scott Cawthon, FNIA (Fan game of FNAF) from Mairusu

Story: Me, Myself, and I

Programming: Me, Myself, and I
